pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Ancient Debris$(li)Copper Ore$(li)Sculk Block$(li)Bone Block$(li)End Stone$(li)Blackstone$(li)Purpur Block

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[375, 64, 40, 75, 0, 10]
This gem can be injected with a tier 2 injector setup.
